00032 #include <glib.h>
00033 #include <dbus/dbus-glib.h>
00034 #include <gconf/gconf-client.h>
00035 
00036 #include "dbus-common.h"
00037 #include "glibhal-main.h"
00038 #include "gpm-screensaver.h"
00039 
00045 gboolean
00046 gscreensaver_set_dpms_timeout (gint timeout)
00047 {
00048     GConfClient *client;
00049 
00050     if (timeout < 0 || timeout > 10 * 60 * 60)
00051         return FALSE;
00052     g_debug ("Adjusting gnome-screensaver dpms_suspend to %i.", timeout);
00053     client = gconf_client_get_default ();
00054     gconf_client_set_int (client, GS_GCONF_ROOT "dpms_suspend", timeout, NULL);
00055     return TRUE;
00056 }
00057 
00065 gboolean
00066 gscreensaver_lock_check (void)
00067 {
00068     GConfClient *client = gconf_client_get_default ();
00069     gboolean should_lock;
00070 
00071     should_lock = gconf_client_get_bool (client, GS_GCONF_ROOT "lock", NULL);
00072     if (!should_lock)
00073         return FALSE;
00074     gscreensaver_lock ();
00075     return TRUE;
00076 }
00077 
00082 gboolean
00083 gscreensaver_is_running (void)
00084 {
00085     GError *error = NULL;
00086     DBusGConnection *session_connection = NULL;
00087     DBusGProxy *gs_proxy = NULL;
00088     gboolean boolret = TRUE;
00089     gboolean temp = TRUE;
00090 
00091     if (!dbus_get_session_connection (&session_connection))
00092         return FALSE;
00093     gs_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00094             GS_LISTENER_SERVICE,
00095             GS_LISTENER_PATH,
00096             GS_LISTENER_INTERFACE);
00097     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gs_proxy, "getActive", &error,
00098                 G_TYPE_INVALID,
00099                 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &temp, G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00100         dbus_glib_error (error);
00101         boolret = FALSE;
00102     }
00103     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (gs_proxy));
00104     return boolret;
00105 }
00106 
00112 gboolean
00113 gscreensaver_set_throttle (gboolean throttle)
00114 {
00115     GError *error = NULL;
00116     DBusGConnection *session_connection = NULL;
00117     DBusGProxy *gs_proxy = NULL;
00118     gboolean boolret = TRUE;
00119 
00120     g_debug ("gnome-screensaver setThrottleEnabled : %i", throttle);
00121     if (!dbus_get_session_connection (&session_connection))
00122         return FALSE;
00123     gs_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00124             GS_LISTENER_SERVICE,
00125             GS_LISTENER_PATH,
00126             GS_LISTENER_INTERFACE);
00127     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gs_proxy, "setThrottleEnabled", &error,
00128                 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, throttle, G_TYPE_INVALID,
00129                 G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00130         dbus_glib_error (error);
00131         g_debug ("gnome-screensaver service is not running.");
00132         boolret = FALSE;
00133     }
00134     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (gs_proxy));
00135     if (!boolret) {
00136         g_debug ("gnome-screensaver setThrottleEnabled failed");
00137         return FALSE;
00138     }
00139     return TRUE;
00140 }
00141 
00146 gboolean
00147 gscreensaver_lock (void)
00148 {
00149     GError *error = NULL;
00150     DBusGConnection *session_connection = NULL;
00151     DBusGProxy *gs_proxy = NULL;
00152     gboolean boolret;
00153 
00154     g_debug ("gnome-screensaver lock");
00155     if (!dbus_get_session_connection (&session_connection))
00156         return FALSE;
00157     gs_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00158             GS_LISTENER_SERVICE,
00159             GS_LISTENER_PATH,
00160             GS_LISTENER_INTERFACE);
00161     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gs_proxy, "lock", &error,
00162                 G_TYPE_INVALID,
00163                 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN, &boolret, G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00164         dbus_glib_error (error);
00165         g_debug ("gnome-screensaver service is not running.");
00166         boolret = FALSE;
00167     }
00168     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (gs_proxy));
00169     if (!boolret) {
00170         g_debug ("gnome-screensaver lock failed");
00171         return FALSE;
00172     }
00173     return TRUE;
00174 }
00175 
00181 gboolean
00182 gscreensaver_get_idle (gint *time)
00183 {
00184     GError *error = NULL;
00185     DBusGConnection *session_connection = NULL;
00186     DBusGProxy *gs_proxy = NULL;
00187     gboolean boolret = TRUE;
00188 
00189     if (!dbus_get_session_connection (&session_connection))
00190         return FALSE;
00191     gs_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (session_connection,
00192             GS_LISTENER_SERVICE,
00193             GS_LISTENER_PATH,
00194             GS_LISTENER_INTERFACE);
00195     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (gs_proxy, "getIdleTime", &error,
00196                 G_TYPE_INVALID,
00197                 G_TYPE_UINT, time, G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00198         dbus_glib_error (error);
00199         g_debug ("gnome-screensaver service is not running.");
00200         boolret = FALSE;
00201     }
00202     g_print ("gscreensaver_get_idle: %i\n", *time);
00203     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (gs_proxy));
00204     if (!boolret) {
00205         g_debug ("gnome-screensaver get idle failed");
00206         return FALSE;
00207     }
00208     return TRUE;
00209 }
